entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains near noon. Wind becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
